en-US.name: School Lunch Viewer
en-US.description: School Lunch Viewer shows a 5-day weekly menu from MealViewer. Users can configure their MealViewer school ID in the Alexa app settings.

publishingInformation.testingInstructions: Say: Alexa, open School Lunch Viewer.

schoolId.name: MealViewer School ID
schoolId.description: Enter your MealViewer school ID. Example: PrairieWindsElementarySchool
